subject: Possible partnership for YouTube videos (Prolama eSports)
description_text:
Hi guys,

I apologize for bothering you, a friend of mine just told me about you guys
and I wanted to reach out because I was really intrigued about the quality
of your products.

I have a small YouTube channel where I do a lot of cool DIY projects and
product reviews and I would love to present your products to my audience.
Would you guys be interested in that?

I totally understand if you guys don't, just wanted to let you know that
your products looks amazing. Keep up the great work.

Cheers and have a great weekend.

Kind regards,
Pedro (Prolama eSports)

https://youtube.com/@prolamaesports?si=vOJU1Cq-6nnYoTE2

conversations.body_text: Hi PROLAMA ESPORTS,    Thank you very much for your recognition! However, we regret to inform you that we are unable to provide you with a set of pedals free of charge. However, we can offer you an exclusive 25% discount and create a commission link for you, through which you can earn a 6-15% commission on an ongoing basis. Would you be willing to accept this offer?

Hi guys,

We completely understand. Thank you for taking the time to answer to us,
maybe we'll be able to work together in the future. Whenever you would like
for us to review sim rallying products (like the steering wheel or the
shifter), let us know. This is something that we know our audience would be
interested in.

Wishing you all the best, your products look amazing.

Have a great weekend.

Kind regards,
Pedro (Prolama eSports)

A sexta, 8/08/2025, 10:45, service@simsonn.com
Hi PROLAMA ESPORTS,    Okay, we have registered your information. We will be upgrading a gearbox soon, and we will send you one first.

Hi guys,

That's amazing news, we're more than happy to help you guys promote it,
review it and give it visibility. Besides the Youtube video review, we
already have a couple of really interesting ideas for a short video for
social media as well. Anyway, let's us know when you have it available.

Have a great day.

Kind regards,
PROLAMA ESPORTS

service@simsonn.com
